meanings.definition: A type of newspaper known for sensationalism and tabloid-style reporting.
meanings.sent1: I saw some redtops at the store with eye-catching headlines.
meanings.sent2: The redtops often focus on celebrity gossip and scandals.
meanings.sent3: The redtops made me chuckle with their exaggerated stories.
meanings.sent4: She always takes the redtops with a grain of salt.
meanings.sent5: The redtops are like a guilty pleasure for many readers.

meanings.definition: The top part of a plant that is red in color.
meanings.sent1: The redtops of the flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: The redtops of the maple tree turned a vibrant shade in autumn.
meanings.sent3: The redtops swayed gently in the breeze, painting the garden red.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite part of the plant was always the redtops.
meanings.sent5: The redtops stood out like flames among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: A type of grass commonly found in pastures and fields.
meanings.sent1: The cows grazed on the lush redtops in the field.
meanings.sent2: The redtops provided a soft bed for the rabbits to rest on.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goats loved nibbling on the redtops.
meanings.sent4: The redtops swayed gracefully in the wind, a sea of red.
meanings.sent5: The redtops carpeted the meadow in a vibrant hue.
